org.openjdk.tools.javac.util

接口 JavacMessages.ResourceBundleHelper

  • 封闭类:
    JavacMessages

    public static interface JavacMessages.ResourceBundleHelper
    This provides a way for the JavacMessager to retrieve a ResourceBundle from another module such as jdk.javadoc.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      ResourceBundle getResourceBundle(Locale locale)
      Gets the ResourceBundle.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getResourceBundle

        ResourceBundle getResourceBundle(Locale locale)
        Gets the ResourceBundle.
        参数:
        locale - the requested bundle's locale
        返回:
        ResourceBundle
